about_the_game:
About the game


The Crown Stones: Mirrah is a dark fantasy game that was thought up as an experience within the land of the dead's lower planes. That is, everything we avoid speaking about or seeing on the land of the living will be commonplace at the Umbraline planes shown in this game. By mixing the formulas found on Castlevania and Dark Souls, we reach The Crown Stones: Mirrah.

  • Game 2D Metroidvania
  • Excellent pixel graphics.
  • Attractive mechanics
  • Smart foes
  • Run, attack or hide yourself
  • Several weapons
  • Secret levels
  • Gradually increasing difficulty
  • Intense Atmosphere
  • High difficulty



In this setting, the player will quickly realize that the land of the dead is the place where everyone can expose the worst of themselves. Activa your Chakras to unleash new sklls, and explore the planes of "The Crown Stones: Mirrah"!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750, 2.66 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 GHz or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200, 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any board DX10 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300, 2.8 GHz / AMD FX-6300, 3.5GHz or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400, 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 750 / AMD RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
